code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String[] indices = Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(request.param("index")).     FieldCapabilitiesRequest fieldRequest = new FieldCapabilitiesRequest().fields(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(request.param("fields"))).indices(indices).     fieldRequest.indicesOptions(IndicesOptions.fromRequest(request, fieldRequest.indicesOptions())).     return channel -> client.fieldCaps(fieldRequest, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
